data: William Bones was a stalwart man, some thirty-five years of age, the master of a Brig which sailed from the port of Boston in Lincolnshire and was half his own property.
The emerald of Catherine the Great
Belloc, Hilaire, 1870-1953; Chesterton, G. K. (Gilbert Keith), 1874-1936 [Illustrator]
